Title: True Stories
Writer: Stephen Tobolowsky, Beth Henley, David Byrne
Actors: John Goodman, Annie McEnroe, Jo Harvey Allen, Spalding Gray
Plot: David Byrne of Talking Heads fame visits a typical (and fictional) Texas town, on the eve of the town's celebration of the state's sesquicentennial. He meets various colorful local characters, most notably Lewis Fyne, a big-hearted bachelor in search of matrimony.
